name: EasyETFs AI World Actively Managed ETF
description: The EasyETFs AI World AMETF is an exchange-traded fund that provides investors with exposure to companies involved in artificial intelligence (AI) technologies across the globe. The fund aims to track the performance of companies at the forefront of AI development and application, spanning sectors such as machine learning, robotics, data science, and automation. Managed by EasyETFs, this fund is designed for investors looking to tap into the rapid growth and innovation within the AI industry. It offers a diversified portfolio of companies leveraging AI to drive technological advancements and future growth, making it ideal for those seeking to invest in a cutting-edge sector with significant long-term potential.
assetSubGroup: Moderately Aggressive ETFs;Artificial Intelligence;easy;easy ai; ai;ametf;offshore;Robotics;Microchips;EasyETF;EasyETFs; Active ETF; ai etf; easy ai; ai ametf;EasyAI;EAM;The Student Economy

name: EasyETFs Global Equity Actively Managed ETF
description: The EasyETFs Global Equity Actively Managed ETF provides investors with exposure to a diversified portfolio of global equities. Actively managed by a professional investment team, the fund aims to deliver capital growth by identifying high-quality, growth-oriented companies across developed and emerging markets. The ETF employs a flexible investment strategy, allowing adjustments to sector and regional allocations based on market conditions and opportunities. This makes it suitable for investors seeking long-term growth through global equity exposure while benefiting from the dynamic decision-making of active management. The fund offers a cost-effective and transparent way to access international markets within a single investment vehicle.
assetSubGroup: Moderately Aggressive ETFs;EAM;easy; EAM ETFs; ametf;EasyETFs; Active ETF

name: EasyETFs Balanced Actively Managed ETF
description: The EasyETFs Balanced Actively Managed ETF is a multi-asset exchange-traded fund designed to provide investors with a balanced portfolio of equities, fixed income, and other asset classes. Actively managed by a team of professionals, the ETF aims to achieve a blend of capital growth and income generation while managing risk through dynamic asset allocation. This balanced approach makes it suitable for investors seeking diversification across various markets and sectors within a single investment vehicle. The fund is tailored to medium-risk investors looking for steady, long-term growth while benefiting from the flexibility and cost-effectiveness of an ETF structure.
assetSubGroup: Moderately Aggressive ETFs;EAM;easy; EAM ETFs; ametf;EasyETFs; Active ETF

name: 1nvestRhodium ETF
description: 1nvest Rhodium ETF is an exchange traded fund launched and managed by Africa ETF Issuer (RF) Limited. It invests in commodity markets. The fund invests in physical rhodium. It seeks to track the returns of the rand rhodium price less the management fee. 1nvest Rhodium ETF was formed on April 15, 2015 and is domiciled in South Africa.

name: 10X Scientific Beta Multi Factor Index Exchange Traded Fund
description: CoreShares Scientific Beta Multi Factor Index ETF is an exchange traded fund launched by Coreshares Index Tracker Managers (RF) Pty Ltd. The fund is managed by Grindrod Asset Management (Pty) Ltd. The fund invests in the public equity markets of South Africa. It seeks to invest in the stocks of companies operating across diversified sectors. The fund invests in the stocks of companies across all market capitalizations. It seeks to replicate the performance of the FTSE/JSE Equally Weighted Top 40 Index. The fund was formerly known as CoreShares Top 40 Equally Weighted ETF. CoreShares Scientific Beta Multi Factor Index ETF was formed on March 25, 2010 and is domiciled in South Africa.

name: Satrix RESI ETF
description: Satrix Resi ETF is an exchange traded fund launched by Satrix Managers (RF) Proprietary Limited. It is managed by Sanlam Investment Management (Pty) Ltd. The fund invests in the public equity markets of South Africa. It seeks to invest in the stocks of companies operating in the resources sector, which includes mining companies, mining holding companies, and mining finance and exploration companies. The fund invests in the stocks of large-cap companies. It seeks to replicate the performance of the FTSE/JSE Resources 10 Index, by investing in the stocks of companies as per their weightings in the index. Satrix Resi ETF was formed on March 15, 2006 and is domiciled in South Africa.

name: Satrix Shariah Top 40 ETF
description: Satrix Collective Investment Scheme - NewFunds Shari'ah Top 40 Index Exchange Traded Fund is a shariah-compliant exchange traded fund launched and managed by NewFunds (Pty) Ltd. It invests in the public equity markets of South Africa. The fund invests in the stocks of companies operating across diversified sectors. It invests in the stocks of large-cap companies. The fund seeks to replicate the performance of the FTSE/JSE Shari'ah Top 40 Index. It does not invest in companies whose primary business provide financial services, deal in alcohol, certain food products, tobacco and weapons provide financial services, deal in alcohol, certain food products, tobacco and weapons. Satrix Collective Investment Scheme - NewFunds Shari'ah Top 40 Index Exchange Traded Fund was formed on February 23, 2009 and is domiciled in South Africa.

name: Satrix Multi Asset Passive Portfolio Solutions Growth ETF
description: Satrix Collective Investment Scheme - MAPPS Growth ETF is an exchange traded fund launched and managed by NewFunds (Pty) Ltd. The fund invests in the public equity and fixed income markets of South Africa. For its equity portion, it invests in stocks of companies operating across diversified sectors. The fund invests in the stocks of companies across all market capitalizations. For its fixed income portion, it invests in inflation-linked bonds issued by the government with maturity greater than one year. The fund seeks to replicate the performance of the MAPPS Growth Index. Satrix Collective Investment Scheme - MAPPS Growth ETF was formed on May 25, 2011 and is domiciled in South Africa.

name: Sygnia Itrix Top 40 ETF
description: Sygnia Itrix Collective Investment Scheme - Sygnia Itrix TOP 40 ETF is an exchange traded fund launched by Sygnia Itrix (RF) Proprietary Limited. It is managed by Sygnia Asset Management (Pty) Ltd. The fund invests in the public equity markets of South Africa. It seeks to invest in the stocks of companies operating across diversified sectors. The fund invests in the stocks of companies across all market capitalizations. It seeks to replicate the performance of the FTSE/JSE TOP 40 Index, by investing in the stocks of companies as per their weightings in the index. Sygnia Itrix Collective Investment Scheme - Sygnia Itrix TOP 40 ETF was formed on October 29, 2017 and is domiciled in South Africa.

name: 10X Wealth Top20 Capped ETF
description: This ETF tracks the Wealth Top 20 Index (a custom index calculated independently by the S&P Dow Jones Indices). Get exposure to large-cap companies (share ranked from 21- 60) on the JSE by float-adjusted market cap with a smart cap of 10%. Designed to be used in conjunction with 10X Wealth Next 40 Equal Weighted ETF.

name: SYGNIA ITRIX MSCI JAPAN
description: Sygnia Itrix MSCI Japan Index ETF is an exchange traded fund launched by Sygnia Itrix (RF) Proprietary Limited. The fund is managed by Mellon Capital Management Corporation. It invests in the public equity markets of Japan. The fund invests in stocks of companies operating across diversified sectors. It invests in stocks of large-cap and mid-cap companies. The fund seeks to replicate the performance of the MSCI Japan Index, by investing in stocks of companies as per their weightings in the index. It was formerly known as db x-trackers MSCI Japan Index ETF. Sygnia Itrix MSCI Japan Index ETF was formed on March 1, 2008 and is domiciled in South Africa.

name: Satrix MSCI China Feeder Portfolio
description: The Satrix MSCI China Feeder ETF is an index tracking fund registered as a Collective Investment Scheme, and is listed on the Johannesburg Stock Exchange as an Exchange Traded Fund. The mandate of the Satrix MSCI China Feeder Portfolio ("Satrix MSCI China Feeder ETF") is to track, as closely as possible, the value of the MSCI China Index in ZAR. The MSCI China Index captures large and mid-cap representation across China A shares, H shares, B shares, Red chips, P chips and foreign listing (e.g ADRs) and covers about 85% of China equity universe. To replicate the index performance the Satrix MSCI China Feeder ETF invests in the iShares MSCI China UCITS ETF (the underlying fund). The investment objective of the underlying fund is to provide investors with a total return, taking into account both capital and income returns, which reflects the return of the MSCI China Index. Investors should note that the performance of the Satrix MSCI China Feeder ETF relative to its benchmark may be affected on a day to day basis as a result of transactions, exchange rates and differing pricing points.

name: FNB Top40 Exchange Traded Fund
description: Ashburton Collective Investment Scheme - Ashburton Top 40 Exchange Traded Fund is an exchange traded fund launched and managed by Ashburton Management Company Proprietary Limited. The fund invests in the public equity markets of South Africa. It seeks to invest in the stocks of companies operating across diversified sectors. The fund invests in the stocks of large-cap companies. It seeks to replicate the performance of the FTSE/JSE Top40 Index, by investing in the stocks of companies as per their weightings in the index. The fund was formerly known as RMB Collective Investment Scheme - RMB Top 40 Exchange Traded Fund. Ashburton Collective Investment Scheme - Ashburton Top 40 Exchange Traded Fund was formed on April 12, 2008 and is domiciled in South Africa.

name: Sygnia Itrix New China Sectors ETF
Satrix 40 ETF
description: Satrix 40 ETF is an exchange traded fund launched by Satrix Managers (RF) Proprietary Limited. The fund is managed by Sanlam Investment Management (Pty) Ltd. It invests in the public equity markets of South Africa. The fund seeks to invest in the stocks of companies operating in resources, industrial, retail, telecommunication, and financial sectors. It invests in the stocks of large-cap companies. The fund seeks to replicate the performance of the FTSE/JSE Top 40 Index, by investing in the stocks of companies as per their weightings in the index. Satrix 40 ETF was formed on November 9, 2000 and is domiciled in South Africa.

name: Satrix Quality South Africa Portfolio ETF
description: The Satrix Quality ETF is an index tracking fund, registered as a Collective Investment Scheme, and is listed on the Johannesburg Stock Exchange as an Exchange Traded Fund. The mandate of the Satrix Quality ETF ("Satrix Quality") is to track, as closely as possible, the value of the proprietary Satrix Quality Index. It aims to capture the return of the equity market enhanced by the quality risk premium. This is achieved by constructing a portfolio tilted towards stocks (or equities) that display positive quality characteristics and away from stocks that display negative quality characteristics. The index is rebalanced twice a year (June and December). In order to reduce costs and minimise tracking error, the Satrix Quality ETF may engage in scrip lending activities with SIM and Investec. Manufactured (taxable) dividends could arise from such transactions.

name: 1nvest TOP 40 ETF
description: 1nvest Top 40 ETF is an exchange traded fund launched by STANLIB Collective Investments Limited. It is managed by STANLIB Asset Management Limited. The fund invests in the public equity markets of South Africa. It seeks to invest in the stocks of companies operating across diversified sectors. The fund invests in the stocks of large-cap companies. It seeks to replicate the performance of the FTSE/ JSE Top 40 Index, by investing in the stocks of companies as per their weightings in the index. 1nvest Top 40 ETF was formed on October 11, 2010 and is domiciled in South Africa.

name: 1nvest SWIX 40 ETF

name: Sygnia Itrix MSCI Emerging Markets 50 ETF
description: The Sygnia Itrix MSCI Emerging Markets 50 ETF is a high-risk, passively managed index-tracking fund registered as a collective investments scheme and listed on the Johannesburg Stock Exchange as an exchange traded fund.

name: Satrix Capped All Share ETF
description: The Satrix Capped All Share ETF tracks the FTSE/JSE Capped All Share Index. This is South Africa’s first market-capitalization weighted index designed to track the entire all-share universe.

name: Satrix Momentum Portfolio
description:
Satrix Momentum ETF is an index tracking fund, registered as a Collective Investment Scheme, and is listed on the Johannesburg Stock Exchange as an Exchange Traded Fund. The mandate of the Satrix Momentum ETF ("Satrix Momentum") is to track, as closely as possible, the value of the proprietary Satrix Momentum Index. It aims to capture the return of the equity market enhanced by the momentum risk premium. This is achieved by constructing a portfolio tilted towards stocks (or equities) that display positive momentum characteristics and away from stocks that display negative momentum characteristics. The index is rebalanced 8 times a year. In order to reduce costs and minimise tracking error, Satrix Momentum ETF may engage in scrip lending activities with SIM and Investec. Manufactured
(taxable) dividends could arise from such transactions.

name: 1nvest S&P500 Info Tech Index Feeder ETF
description: The objective of the 1nvest S&P500 Info Tech Index Feeder ETF is to replicate the S&P 500 Capped 35/20 Information Technology Index as closely as possible by utilising the Feeder Fund framework. The fund is a feeder fund and as such, apart from assets in liquid form, it consists solely of participatory interests in the iShares S&P 500 Information Technology Sector UCITS ETF (the ETF). The ETF seeks to track the performance of the S&P 500 Capped 35/20 Information Technology Index (Index) by holding the equity securities, which make up the Index, in similar proportions to it. The Index measures the performance of stocks from the S&P 500 Index which are within the Global Industry Classification Standard (GICS) information technology sector and uses capping to ensure diversification among companies within the index. The Index is rebalanced quarterly.

name: Satrix Value Equity ETF
description: Satrix Collective Investment Scheme - Satrix Value Equity ETF is headquartered in South Africa.

name: Satrix Capped INDI ETF
description: Satrix Capped INDI ETF is an exchange traded fund launched by Satrix Managers (RF) Proprietary Limited. The fund is managed by Sanlam Investment Management (Pty) Ltd. The fund seeks to replicate the performance of the JSE/Actuaries Industrial 25 Top Companies Index, by investing in the stocks of companies as per their weightings in the index. It was formerly known as Satrix INDI ETF. Satrix Capped INDI ETF was formed on January 28, 2002 and is domiciled in South Africa.

name: ETFSA Balanced Foundation Prescient AMETF
description: The ETFSA Balanced Foundation Prescient AM ETF is a balanced exchange-traded fund (ETF) that seeks to provide investors with a diversified portfolio of assets, including equities, bonds, and other instruments, with the goal of achieving long-term growth while managing risk. Managed by Prescient Investment Management, this ETF is designed to offer a well-rounded investment option that balances capital appreciation with income generation, making it suitable for investors seeking a foundational, all-in-one investment solution.

name: Satrix Low Volatility ETF
description: NewFunds Collective Investment - Low Volatility Equity ETF Fund is headquartered in South Africa.

The fund invests in the stocks of companies across all market capitalizations. Satrix RAFI 40 ETF was formed on September 8, 2008 and is domiciled in South Africa.

name: Satrix S&P Namibia Bond ETF
description: The Satrix S&P Namibian Bond ETF offers investors exposure to a portfolio of Namibian government and corporate bonds, tracking the performance of the S&P Namibia Sovereign Bond 1+ Year Index, with the goal of providing stable income and capital appreciation.

name: Satrix FINI ETF
description: Satrix FINI ETF is an exchange traded fund launched by Satrix Managers (RF) Proprietary Limited. The fund is managed by Sanlam Investment Management (Pty) Ltd. It invests in the public equity markets of South Africa. The fund seeks to invest in the stocks of companies operating in the financial sector. It invests in the stocks of large-cap companies. The fund seeks to replicate the performance of the FTSE/JSE Financial 15 Index, by investing in the stocks of companies as per their weightings in the index. Satrix FINI ETF was formed on January 28, 2002 and is domiciled in South Africa.

name: Sygnia Itrix 4th Industrial Rev Global Equity ETF
description: Sygnia Itrix Collective Investment Scheme - Sygnia Itrix 4th Industrial Revolution Global Equity ETF is an exchange traded fund launched by Sygnia Itrix (RF) Proprietary Limited. It is managed by Sygnia Asset Management (Pty) Ltd. The fund invests in the public equity markets of South Africa. It seeks to invest in the stocks of companies operating in the technology sector, including autonomous vehicles, cleantech, drones, 3D printing, robotics, nanotechnology, smart buildings, virtual reality, cybersecurity, space, and wearables. The fund invests in the stocks of companies across all market capitalizations. It seeks to replicate the performance of the Kensho New Economies Composite Index, by investing in the stocks of companies as per their weightings in the index. Sygnia Itrix Collective Investment Scheme - Sygnia Itrix 4th Industrial Revolution Global Equity ETF was formed on December 5, 2017 and is domiciled in South Africa.

name: 1nvest MSCI EM Asia Index Feeder ETF
description: Astute investors understand the power of a deliberate and focused diversification strategy, especially one that gives investors access to differentiated and progressive markets. To this end, 1nvest is expanding its Global Range fund offering by introducing the 1nvest MSCI EM Asia Index Feeder ETF which gives a portfolio exposure to the performance of large- and mid-cap stocks in 8 select Asian emerging countries. This ETF will list on the Johannesburg Stock Exchange on 18 August 2022 (JSE code ETFEMA) and will be a feeder fund into the iShares MSCI EM Asia UCITS ETF. Once again, 1nvest shows that we are committed to providing relevant, cost-effective and progressive funds.

name: Sygnia Itrix Fang.AI AMETF
description: The Sygnia Itrix FANG.AI AMETF is an exchange-traded fund that provides investors with exposure to a select group of large-cap technology and innovation-driven companies, focusing specifically on the FANG stocks (Facebook, Amazon, Netflix, Google) and other major players in artificial intelligence (AI) and technology sectors. This ETF tracks an index that includes companies leading in digital transformation, AI development, cloud computing, social media, e-commerce, and streaming services. Managed by Sygnia, this fund allows investors to participate in the growth of high-impact tech sectors that are shaping the future of the digital economy. It is suitable for those looking to diversify into high-growth tech and AI-driven companies through a single, cost-effective investment vehicle.

name: Satrix Nasdaq 100 Feeder Portfolio
description: Satrix Collective Investment Scheme - Satrix Nasdaq 100 Feeder Portfolio is a feeder fund launched by Satrix Managers (RF) Proprietary Limited. It is managed by Sanlam Investment Management (Pty) Ltd. The fund invests its entire corpus in an underlying fund. Satrix Collective Investment Scheme - Satrix Nasdaq 100 Feeder Portfolio was formed on April 10, 2018 and is domiciled in South Africa.

name: PortfolioMetrix Active Income Prescient AMETF
description: The PortfolioMetrix Active Income Prescient AMETF’s objective is to achieve a high level of sustainable income and to prioritise the preservation of capital invested. The fund is managed to the same mandate and objective as the PortfolioMetrix BCI Dynamic Income Fund, with the additional accessibility and convenience an ETF provides to investors.

name: Satrix MSCI Emerging Markets ETF
description: Satrix Collective Investment Scheme - Satrix MSCI Emerging Markets Feeder Portfolio is a feeder fund launched and managed by Satrix Managers (RF) Proprietary Limited. It invests its entire corpus in the iShares Core MSCI Emerging Markets IMI UCITS ETF. Satrix Collective Investment Scheme - Satrix MSCI Emerging Markets Feeder Portfolio is domiciled in South Africa.

name: FNB Government Inflation Linked Bond ETF
description: Ashburton Government Inflation Linked Bond Fund is an exchange traded fund launched and managed by Ashburton Management Company Proprietary Limited. The fund invests in the fixed income markets of South Africa. It invests in the government inflation-linked bonds. The fund seeks to replicate the performance of the Government Inflation Linked Bond Index, by investing in the securities as per their weightings in the index. It was formerly known as RMB Government Inflation Linked Bond Fund. Ashburton Government Inflation Linked Bond Fund was formed on March 5, 2009 and is domiciled in South Africa.

name: Satrix GOVI ETF
description: NewFunds Collective Investment Scheme - NewFunds GOVI ETF is an exchange traded fund launched by Absa Capital. It is co-managed by Absa Captal Alternative Asset Management (Proprietary) Limited and NewFunds (Pty) Ltd. The fund invests in the fixed income markets of South Africa. It invests in bonds issued by the government with maturity greater than one year. The fund seeks to replicate the performance of the South African Government Bond Total Return Index. NewFunds Collective Investment Scheme - NewFunds GOVI ETF was formed on January 11, 2012 and is domiciled in South Africa.

name: 10X S&P 500 Exchange Traded Fund
description: CoreShares Global Investments PCC - CoreShares S&P 500 Exchange Traded Fund is an exchange traded fund launched and managed by CoreShares ETF Managers Ltd. It invests in the public equity markets of the United States. The fund invests directly and also through Vanguard ETFs in the stocks of companies operating across diversified sectors. It invests in the stocks of large-cap companies, with market capitalization of US$ 5.3 billion or higher. The fund seeks to replicate the performance of the S&P 500 Index, by investing in the stocks of companies as per their weightings in the index. CoreShares Global Investments PCC - CoreShares S&P 500 Exchange Traded Fund was formed on May 9, 2016 and is domiciled in Mauritius.

name: Satrix MSCI ACWI Feeder ETF
description: (ZAR) The Satrix MSCI ACWI Feeder ETF is an exchange-traded fund that offers investors exposure to a broad range of global equity markets. The ETF aims to track the performance of the MSCI All Country World Index (ACWI), which includes large and mid-cap companies across developed and emerging markets. Managed by Satrix, this fund provides a diversified portfolio representing over 23 developed and 24 emerging market countries, making it an ideal investment for those seeking global diversification in a single instrument. The Satrix MSCI ACWI Feeder ETF enables investors to participate in the growth of international equity markets while benefiting from the cost-efficiency and transparency typically associated with ETFs

name: 1nvest SA Property ETF
description: 1nvest SA Property ETF is an exchange traded fund launched by STANLIB Collective Investments Limited. It is managed by STANLIB Asset Management Limited. The fund invests in the public equity markets of South Africa. It seeks to invest in the stocks of companies operating in the real estate sector. The fund invests in the stocks of large-cap companies. It seeks to replicate the performance of the FTSE/ JSE SA Listed Property Index, by investing in the stocks of companies as per their weightings in the index. 1nvest SA Property ETF was formed on February 7, 2013 and is domiciled in South Africa.

name: Satrix MSCI Emerging Markets ESG Enhanced ETF
description: The Satrix MSCI EM ESG Enhanced Feeder ETF is an index tracking fund registered as a Collective Investment Scheme, and is listed on the Johannesburg Stock Exchange as an Exchange Traded Fund. The mandate of the Satrix MSCI EM ESG Enhanced Feeder Portfolio (‘Satrix MSCI EM ESG Enhanced Feeder ETF”) is to track, as closely as possible, the value of the MSCI EM ESG Enhanced Focus CTB Index in ZAR. The MSCI EM ESG Enhanced Focus CTB Index measures the performance of emerging market companies that screens out controversial business areas and gives greater weighting to companies with higher environmental, social and governance (ESG) scores. To replicate the index performance the Satrix MSCI EM ESG Enhanced Feeder ETF invests in the iShares MSCI EM ESG Enhanced UCITS ETF (the underlying fund). The investment objective of the underlying fund is to provide investors with a total return, taking into account both capital and income returns, which reflects the return of the MSCI EM ESG Enhanced Focus CTB Index. Investors should note that the performance of the Satrix MSCI EM ESG Enhanced Feeder ETF relative to its benchmark may be affected on a day to day basis as a result of transactions, exchange rates and differing pricing points.

name: SYGNIA ITRIX MSCI US
description: Sygnia Itrix MSCI USA Index ETF is an exchange traded fund launched and managed by db x-trackers (Pty) Ltd. It is co-managed by Mellon Capital Management Corporation. The fund invests in public equity markets of the United States. It invests in stocks of companies operating across diversified sectors. The fund invests in stocks of mid-cap and large-cap companies. It seeks to replicate the performance of the MSCI USA Index, by investing in stocks of companies as per their weightings in the index. The fund was formerly known as db x-trackers MSCI USA Index ETF. Sygnia Itrix MSCI USA Index ETF was formed on February 13, 2008 and is domiciled in South Africa.

name: Satrix SA Bond Portfolio
description: The mandate of the Satrix SA Bond ETF is to track, as closely as possible, the value of the S&P South Africa Sovereign Bond 1+ Year Index. The Satrix SA Bond ETF Is an index tracking fund, registered as a collective investment Scheme, and is also listed on the Johannesburg Stock Exchange as an Exchange Traded Fund. The Satrix SA Bond ETF provides investors with South Africa Goverment Bond exposure as an asset class. In accordance with the investment policy of the Satrix SA Bond, all income received from instruments comprising the index, net of cost is distributed. In order to reduce costs and minimise tracking error, the Satrix SA Bond may engage in scrip lending activities.

name: Satrix S&P 500 ETF
description: Satrix Collective Investment Scheme - Satrix S&P 500 Feeder Portfolio is a feeder fund launched and managed by Satrix Managers (RF) Proprietary Limited. It invests its entire corpus in the iShares Core S&P 500 UCITS ETF. Satrix Collective Investment Scheme - Satrix S&P 500 Feeder Portfolio is domiciled in South Africa.

name: Sygnia Itrix S&P Global 1200 ESG ETF
